about_the_game:
Border Patrol is a 2D comic-style simulation game where players take on the role of a border officer responsible for inspecting incoming and outgoing vehicles, searching for contraband, and dealing with corruption and forgery.

Backgrounds:
As a newly appointed border officer, you are assigned to a crucial border checkpoint in a turbulent nation where border security is of utmost importance. Through a series of inspections, investigations, and decisions, you must maintain the safety and order of the border. Throughout this journey, you will face various moral and ethical challenges, making choices between justice and personal gain. Ultimately, your decisions will determine the nation's future, whether it leads to peace and prosperity or descends into chaos and conflict.

Border Patrol offers an immersive border inspection experience with its rich narrative and profound decision-making system, exploring complex relationships between power, morality, and human nature.


Features:
Inspect Vehicles and Personnel: Players need to carefully check the documents, cargo, and backgrounds of each vehicle and person crossing the border to identify any suspicious elements.
Combat Smuggling and Corruption: Using various tools and methods such as scanners, sniffer dogs, and undercover informants, players must detect and prevent various smuggling activities.
Manage Resources: Players need to manage the checkpoint's resources, including personnel, equipment, and funds, to ensure efficient operation of the checkpoint.
Handle Emergencies: Players must respond to various emergencies such as terrorist attacks, sudden inspections, and internal corruption, making quick decisions to protect border security.
Interact with Different Factions: Players can choose to interact with different political factions, criminal organizations, and social groups, influencing the game's progress through negotiation, bribery, or forceful measures.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or Greater
  • Processor: x64 SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or Greater
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit or Apple silicon
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
